alert.note: Alert for Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 9:53PM CDT until July 22 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...SOUTHWESTERN WINNESHIEK AND EASTERN CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 953 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lawler, or 10 miles east of New Hampton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Hawkeye around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads B 54 And V 56, Donnan, County Roads V 56 And B 33, Highway 93 And County V 68, Waucoma Campground, Jackson Junction and Alpha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
